text: Teuma tapeugah haba mangat that Keu bandum umat iman keu Allah Amai nyang jroh-jroh jipubuet meuhat Churuga teumpat keu jih Neukeubah Ile deungon krueng di yup jih meuhat Raseuki pih that mangat sileupah Jan troh raseuki keunan geuintat Boh kayee meuhat sambot le bagah Raseuki kamoe geukheun le ligat Taeu saban that lagee nyang sudah Geujok makanan sang-sang saban that Judo lom meuhat suci sileupah Bandum cit keukai sinan meusapat Keubit seunang that churuga indah
